I then gave some of this to my male friend to use as he has oilyresilient skin and he’s quite fond of it. So I really think this is one of those lines that you can appreciate what they’re doing since skincare has really boomed with the gen z population, but would i gift it to anyone who uses skincare already? No.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I have used this product for many years. Over the years I tried different products and this one is the best. It is very gentle to the skin, but also does a good job removing oil and other unwanted impurity from the face. However, I am dismayed to discover that this product has disappeared from the store shelves. I tried the Naturals Purifying Cream Cleanser but am bothered by the tingling sensation around my eye areas.Once I find a good facial skin care product, I usually stick to it. This practice has done wonders to help my skin stay young. However, this is not the first time that a product I love has gone away and being replaced by a new and less satisfactory product. I would really hope that a product like this extra gentle cleaner that is used several times daily would be brought back!

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: Usually cleansers are harsh on my skin, and sometimes even sensitive cleansers don't work out well for me. But this I recommend, it's soft it's gentle and it does it's job well. I use it twice a day and at the end of the day I use this after taking off my makeup and it my skin just feels soft and clean. Not striped and dry. I love it

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I have been using this cleanser for a few years now, and I absolutely love it. Although I have an oily complexion, my skin is very sensitive. I had been having trouble finding it in the stores but recently cannot find it anywhere. Has it been discontinued?

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I have never used a cream cleanser. I always used a foaming face wash, but my skin had been breaking out terribly. My skin is not oily and breaks out if it gets too dry so I decided to try the Extra Gentle Cleanser creamy formula and have not had one break out in 6 months. I absolutely love it and my skin feels so soft. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has dry, sensitive skin.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: Let me start by saying that I am generally a cosmetic/beauty product snob. Unless I am in a pinch, I do not use drugstore brands. That being said, this is the absolute best cleanser I have ever used for my fair, sensitive skin that is prone to dryness. I have used so many other specialty and high end brands and none of them have been as good. This has never left my skin irritated. It always feels soft and moisturized and never tight. I have used enough beauty products in my life to know that the tight feeling that people equate to cleanliness is not necessary. When I use this cleaner my skin looks youthful and free from fine lines. My only concern is my inability to find this anymore. None of my local drugstores or grocery stores ever have it. They only ever have the Ultra Gentle Cleanser which is not at all what I want. If I am out of town and I see it, I will literally buy every single one the store has. I hope that this does not get discontinued as it takes me years to find products that I am loyal to. This is a must for anyone with sensitive skin who normally won't give drugstore brands a chance.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I switched to this cleanser when I realized my old "organic gentle acne cleanser" had menthol and added fragrances in it. Menthol is an irritant but is added to products so you get that fresh tingly feeling, which is more likely due to subtle inflammation than being "fresh and clean". I also decided that I didn't want anything in my cleanser that had "added benefits". This might sound contradictory but I just wanted a cleanser that cleaned in the most gentle effective way possible; I get the benefits of vitamins and anti-oxidants from my toner and moisturizers that don't get washed down the drain.It was an interesting switch at the start, as my face didn't have that usual tingle/tight feeling BUT it was still SO clean and fresh! My skin is definitely feeling healthier, and looks great. This cleanser will be a keeper!

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: i've been using this product so many years and i really relly really really love it. but unfortunely, this product was discontinue in my country. i want it back please!!! help me how to get it back?????

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: My skin, as I'm only a teenager, is not perfect. It is always difficult to maintain clear skin with such sensitive skin aswell. Everyone would be heartbroken.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I use this product daily to wash my face. Other cleansers leave my sensitive, fair skin dry and itchy. My only complaint is that I often have to go to more than one store to find one with it in stock. I have recommended to many people over the years.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I am 79 with tissue paper thin skin that can get very dry and cracks especially in the winter. I wash my hands with this extra gentle cleanser many times a day and have stopped getting the little cracks in the skin above my fingernails. I add my wishes to those who beg you not to discontinue this item -- there is nothing else like it. I depend on it.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I have an extremely sensitive skin and this product have saved my skin. It is so inexpensive and keeps my skin young and wrinkle free. ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: This product feels great on my skin, and makes my face feel soft and refreshed all day. This product is very gentle and doesn't burn or sting my eyes.My morning routine: splash water on my face, apply this & rinse off with water. While my face is still wet, I use the Neutrogena Deep Clean Gentle Scrub to exfoliate then I dry my face. I then use a face moisturizer (finishing a bottle that is currently open; then switching to a Neutrogena product). I wait 5 mins then apply Neutrogena's Ultra-Sheer Dry Touch SPF 45 Sunscreen, then let that absorb for 10-20 mins before applying makeup. Leaves my face super soft throughout the day, and greatly reduces the appearance of oil on my face (I have a very oily T-zone). Love that it reduces it! If your face is a bit shiny after the sunscreen, just dab on a bit of power :)Night routine: quickly remove makeup with a remover (just get what you can off), use this cleanser (removes the last of my lingering makeup, both eyes and face) + scrub, apply moisturizer, and go to bed!

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I love this cleanser. I have sensitive skin and it removes makeup and doesn't cause any reactions. I agree with the previous review that it has been hard to find lately. Please keep it in production. Thanks.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL
Reviews: I have been using the Extra Gentle Cleanser for years. It does a great job cleaning off makeup, and my skin looks and feels good afterwards. I am so afraid that this product is going to be taken off the market (because of difficulty in finding it recently) that I decided to write a review hoping to influence readers to try it and to persuade Neutrogena to keep it as an active product line. I'm ordering some today.

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

ProductName: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Extra Gentle Cleanser 200mL

I feel they could benefit better by having it in a bottle/tube rather than a packet like what we received as it was hard to get it all out and I don’t think I had enough to properly apply it to my face. In general it was fantastic and I’ll probably buy it again.

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g
Reviews: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Mask was quite difficult to apply - would work better in different packaging. The smell was pleasant but reasonably strong.  Took longer than the time specified to set. Pulling it off was a bit uncomfortable but did at least feel like it was doing it’s job. It did leave my skin feeling and looking smooth and soft. Left random little crusty bits of the mask on my face which was a bit annoying. Also was annoying to get off my sink where had it dripped trying to apply it. Overall I think it did make a positive difference to my skin but probably not enough that it was worth the time and effort.

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g

ProductName: Neutrogena Deep Clean Purifying Peel Off Mask 10g
Reviews: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The mask has a fun vibrant colour and strong fragrance.
